attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: Why r u banning Tiktok has made all of us happy we actually enjoy it so why take away Tiktok from us stop trying to make us miserable then I’m already am like don’t take it away 😭🤧

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!
attributes.review: this app is one of the worst apps i’ve had. it crashes, and there’s a weird dude with a tupé on my screen. he’s orange for some reason? please get this app off the app store because it’s horrible!!!!! 😣

attributes.title: Dreadful
attributes.review: This app is the worst. Very satanic ,Demonic ,through the whole app ,Very creepy and disturbing . Every time I enter the app I get stabbed at night I have been to the hospital three times now I am currently in it cause I got stabbed . DONT GET THE APP I REPEAT DONT GET THE APP

attributes.title: this app, much like this man, is totally ineffective.
attributes.review: this app crashes all the time!! it is also completely unreadable and makes me sad as an american. i have several thoughts on how we could truly make america great again, but unfortunately none of them even remotely resemble the ideas presented within this app by mr. trump. a waste of storage space and a waste of my time.

attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️✨this app is disgusting ✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: This app is AWFUL It wouldn’t stop crashing there were SO many glitches it just needs to be taken off the App store immediately. Gen z rules 🤪

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Always crashes my phone when I try to open it! Wth I’m such a trump supporter but if he can’t even get his app to work properly then how can he run a country.

attributes.title: This is not a good app
attributes.review: This app encourages racism, sexism, homophobia, and many other issues. It encourages ignorance and violence. The app also took a long time to download. 1/5 stars if there was a have a star I’d leave that.

attributes.title: Hated the app
attributes.review: Downloaded the app expecting an oompa loompa to show on my screen but all I saw was this unpeeled carrot. Along with the frightening sight, it also wiped all of my phone’s information and sent it to... china! What a shame 😔

attributes.title: It is the worst app I have ever gotten
attributes.review: This app made my phone crash so many times it made my phone die so fast if I could give it a 0 I would

attributes.title: Basic
attributes.review: Got the app so I could leave an honest review. Just like his twitter account this app is full of nonsense and looks like it could have been made by a freshman entering a computer science class. VERY BAD!!!!
